page.title: 17Children's Games
page.content: The games we play today vary in what age you are in.The girls may like different games to the boys e.g. in games lessons ,rounders for girls, cricket for boys.Smaller children like games involving dolls and that sort of thing,nowadays young children and older children have computers and play space invaders and all types of computer games.Eletronic games are popular as well.Children don't always need objects to have a good game they can play tick,hide and seek and many other games.Boys mostly smaller ones have games as if they are in space, with toy figures.Most people enjoy tennis and badmington.Lot of people enjoy playing leap-frog.In school or out,a lot of boys play football.In the summer girls play rounders.On swings and playgrounds children play a lot of other games.
